job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate code and evaluating that code, rather than building, training, or deploying AI models. It emphasizes human feedback for AI training and lacks the core technical responsibilities of an ML or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the process of training and evaluating AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, even if the role is more about providing feedback than direct model development.

phrases: lend your coding expertise to train AI models
no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: The description highlights the need for coding expertise and explicitly states no prior AI experience is required, implying a learning and adaptation component to the role.

phrases: Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code.
soft_skills.justification: The mention of 'discrete, highly variable problems' suggests a need for problem-solving skills to navigate and address these challenges effectively.
